title: KatieCouric.com: How to Talk to Vaccine-Hesitant Friends and Family
description: Even as coronavirus vaccines become more widely distributed, a significant chunk of Americans remain unsure or skeptical about the vaccine. Julie Parsonnet, MD, Stanford Medicine infectious disease doctor, shares some tips for handling tough vaccine-related conversations with your loved ones.
